data.message: Add portable git hooks setup for smoke test enforcement: Created hooks/pre-push that runs smoke_test.py, scripts/install-hooks.sh installer, and .github/workflows/smoke.yml for CI. Pre-push hook successfully blocks push on test failure.
data.task: Add portable git hooks setup for smoke test enforcement
data.outcome: Created hooks/pre-push that runs smoke_test.py, scripts/install-hooks.sh installer, and .github/workflows/smoke.yml for CI. Pre-push hook successfully blocks push on test failure.
